description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73.a) to vary condition 2 (plans) to eliminate the existing flat roof over the ground floor extension and fully building on the line of the existing ground floor extension as the flat roof  of planning permission ref: 234153HH dated 23/12/2023 for: First floor side extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end, rear roof extension; installation of five roof lights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The proposed hipped roof over two storey side extension, by reason of its height, depth, design and scale would constitute an incongruous and illogical addition to the building and local area that would fail to appear subservient to the original house and would result in being out of keeping with the character and general pattern of area. As such, the development would therefore fail to comply with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
